detail.tooltip: SELECT top 1 a.id prod_baseid,isnull(b.speed,0) speed,a.[录入时间],a.[品种],a.[机台],a.[班别],a.[班次] FROM dbo.view_paper_record_prod_base AS a left join tbl_paper_record_prod_part_constant b on a.id=b.prod_baseid  and b.ip =? ORDER BY a.id DESC

detail.tooltip: SELECT top 1 a.id prod_baseid,isnull(b.safe_line_pay_ta,0) safe_line_remain_ta,isnull(b.safe_line_pay_tb,0) safe_line_remain_tb,a.[录入时间],a.[品种],a.[机台],a.[班别],a.[班次] FROM dbo.view_paper_record_prod_base AS a left join tbl_paper_record_prod_part_wet b on a.id=b.prod_baseid and b.ip ='0.0.0.0' ORDER BY a.id DESC

detail.tooltip: SELECT TOP 1 a.id prod_baseid,isnull(b.speed,0) speed,convert(varchar,isnull(b.complete_time,getdate()) ,120) start_time,a.[录入时间],a.[品种],a.[机台],a.[班别],a.[班次] FROM dbo.view_paper_record_prod_base AS a LEFT JOIN tbl_paper_record_prod_log_paper_param b ON a.id = b.prod_baseid AND b.ip =? ORDER BY b.id DESC
